reviewText: Wow. What a powerful display of LOVE....... It's all about LOVE!!!!!!!! As an actor/writer/performer I'll never forget this day that i introduced myself to Sir Roy London. I was i was able to study with you, you were a Giant among us. Thank you for your knowledge and gracefulness.

If anyone want to become an actor, or director, or is an actor or director, they need to watch this! Roy 'got it'... Acting was created as a healing modality in Ancient Greece, and Roy was the first teacher in modern times to understand the transformative power that acting can have on an audience, and how to teach an actor to be the healers they are meant to be.
a brilliant man I knew nothing about until years after his death. Inspiring video with an aesthetic for acting from your authenticity. He was a rare teacher.

This is a must for any Roy London fan.
A lot of actors talking about Roy, Acting and Life.
It even contains Roy himself saying words of wisdom, the entire video is really inspiring!
Special Thanks
- Mac
